creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: fan with minimal landscape scene; three horizontal banks with trees; three faint, small boats URQ; wispy calligraphy L half; signature LRC, stamps center R and LRC
marks: L half of fan: [ あかしがたこよひの月乃影きよく波ぢはるけきふねぞこぎ行く ] (O LRC: [ 玉瀾]  {Gyokuran}
medium: Hanging scroll; ink on mica paper
title: Akashi Bay
